a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Cereals allocated to food, animal feed and fuel
Cereal crops allocated to direct human consumption, used for animal feed, and other uses â€“ mainly industrial uses
such as biofuel production. This is based on domestic supply quantity for countries after correction for imports,
Data source: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (2023)
Note: The FAO apply a methodological change from the year 2010 onwards.
